channel.title: Make Over Mage
channel.description:
Ok, well i couldnt find the make over mage (the npc u talk to, to change your appearance) anywhere, so i looking in auto spawn and found his coordinates, i teleported there, and he was litterly surrounded by black, so i tried to change my characters look, abnd verytime i tried to change hair colour, the client froze, any ideas why?
Thanks

item.title: Make Over Mage
item.dc:creator: @Failurescape Failurescape
item.description:
@Failurescape wrote:

what client/source you using it may be cause he is in nowhere or its because a player is in complete black i had this happen to me so i would just make a ::char thing or move him

Read full topic
